module Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.DBClusterRole

-- | Describes an Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that is
--   associated with a cluster.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDBClusterRole</a> smart constructor.
data DBClusterRole
DBClusterRole' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> DBClusterRole

-- | Describes the state of association between the IAMrole and the
--   cluster. The <tt>Status</tt> property returns one of the following
--   values:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><tt>ACTIVE</tt> - The IAMrole ARN is associated with the cluster
--   and can be used to access other Amazon Web Services services on your
--   behalf.</li>
--   <li><tt>PENDING</tt> - The IAMrole ARN is being associated with the
--   cluster.</li>
--   <li><tt>INVALID</tt> - The IAMrole ARN is associated with the cluster,
--   but the cluster cannot assume the IAMrole to access other Amazon Web
--   Services services on your behalf.</li>
--   </ul>
[$sel:status:DBClusterRole'] :: DBClusterRole -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAMrole that is associated with
--   the DB cluster.
[$sel:roleArn:DBClusterRole'] :: DBClusterRole -> Maybe Text

--   omitted.

module Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.DBClusterSnapshot

-- | Detailed information about a cluster snapshot.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDBClusterSnapshot</a> smart constructor.
data DBClusterSnapshot
DBClusterSnapshot' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ISO8601 -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ISO8601 -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> DBClusterSnapshot

-- | Provides the version of the database engine for this cluster snapshot.
[$sel:engineVersion:DBClusterSnapshot'] :: DBClusterSnapshot -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies the status of this cluster snapshot.
[$sel:status:DBClusterSnapshot'] :: DBClusterSnapshot -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies whether the cluster snapshot is encrypted.
[$sel:storageEncrypted:DBClusterSnapshot'] :: DBClusterSnapshot -> Maybe Bool

-- | Specifies the cluster identifier of the cluster that this cluster
--   snapshot was created from.
[$sel:dbClusterIdentifier:DBClusterSnapshot'] :: DBClusterSnapshot -> Maybe Text

-- | Provides the master user name for the cluster snapshot.
[$sel:masterUsername:DBClusterSnapshot'] :: DBClusterSnapshot -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the cluster snapshot.
[$sel:dbClusterSnapshotArn:DBClusterSnapshot'] :: DBClusterSnapshot -> Maybe Text

-- | Provides the virtual private cloud (VPC) ID that is associated with
--   the cluster snapshot.
[$sel:vpcId:DBClusterSnapshot'] :: DBClusterSnapshot -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies the identifier for the cluster snapshot.
[$sel:dbClusterSnapshotIdentifier:DBClusterSnapshot'] :: DBClusterSnapshot -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies the name of the database engine.
[$sel:engine:DBClusterSnapshot'] :: DBClusterSnapshot -> Maybe Text

-- | Provides the list of Amazon EC2 Availability Zones that instances in
--   the cluster snapshot can be restored in.
[$sel:availabilityZones:DBClusterSnapshot'] :: DBClusterSnapshot -> Maybe [Text]

-- | Provides the type of the cluster snapshot.
[$sel:snapshotType:DBClusterSnapshot'] :: DBClusterSnapshot -> Maybe Text

-- | If <tt>StorageEncrypted</tt> is <tt>true</tt>, the KMS key identifier
--   for the encrypted cluster snapshot.
[$sel:kmsKeyId:DBClusterSnapshot'] :: DBClusterSnapshot -> Maybe Text

-- | Provides the time when the snapshot was taken, in UTC.
[$sel:snapshotCreateTime:DBClusterSnapshot'] :: DBClusterSnapshot -> Maybe ISO8601

-- | If the cluster snapshot was copied from a source cluster snapshot, the
--   ARN for the source cluster snapshot; otherwise, a null value.
[$sel:sourceDBClusterSnapshotArn:DBClusterSnapshot'] :: DBClusterSnapshot -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies the time when the cluster was created, in Universal
--   Coordinated Time (UTC).
[$sel:clusterCreateTime:DBClusterSnapshot'] :: DBClusterSnapshot -> Maybe ISO8601

-- | Specifies the percentage of the estimated data that has been
--   transferred.
[$sel:percentProgress:DBClusterSnapshot'] :: DBClusterSnapshot -> Maybe Int

-- | Specifies the port that the cluster was listening on at the time of
--   the snapshot.
[$sel:port:DBClusterSnapshot'] :: DBClusterSnapshot -> Maybe Int

-- | Create a value of <a>DBClusterSnapshot</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:engineVersion:DBClusterSnapshot'</a>,
--   <a>dbClusterSnapshot_engineVersion</a> - Provides the version of the
--   database engine for this cluster snapshot.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:DBClusterSnapshot'</a>, <a>dbClusterSnapshot_status</a>
--   - Specifies the status of this cluster snapshot.
--   
--   <a>$sel:storageEncrypted:DBClusterSnapshot'</a>,
--   <a>dbClusterSnapshot_storageEncrypted</a> - Specifies whether the
--   cluster snapshot is encrypted.
--   
--   <a>$sel:dbClusterIdentifier:DBClusterSnapshot'</a>,
--   <a>dbClusterSnapshot_dbClusterIdentifier</a> - Specifies the cluster
--   identifier of the cluster that this cluster snapshot was created from.
--   
--   <a>$sel:masterUsername:DBClusterSnapshot'</a>,
--   <a>dbClusterSnapshot_masterUsername</a> - Provides the master user
--   name for the cluster snapshot.
--   
--   <a>$sel:dbClusterSnapshotArn:DBClusterSnapshot'</a>,
--   <a>dbClusterSnapshot_dbClusterSnapshotArn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) for the cluster snapshot.
--   
--   <a>$sel:vpcId:DBClusterSnapshot'</a>, <a>dbClusterSnapshot_vpcId</a> -
--   Provides the virtual private cloud (VPC) ID that is associated with
--   the cluster snapshot.
--   
--   <a>$sel:dbClusterSnapshotIdentifier:DBClusterSnapshot'</a>,
--   <a>dbClusterSnapshot_dbClusterSnapshotIdentifier</a> - Specifies the
--   identifier for the cluster snapshot.
--   
--   <a>$sel:engine:DBClusterSnapshot'</a>, <a>dbClusterSnapshot_engine</a>
--   - Specifies the name of the database engine.
--   
--   <a>$sel:availabilityZones:DBClusterSnapshot'</a>,
--   <a>dbClusterSnapshot_availabilityZones</a> - Provides the list of
--   Amazon EC2 Availability Zones that instances in the cluster snapshot
--   can be restored in.
--   
--   <a>$sel:snapshotType:DBClusterSnapshot'</a>,
--   <a>dbClusterSnapshot_snapshotType</a> - Provides the type of the
--   cluster snapshot.
--   
--   <a>$sel:kmsKeyId:DBClusterSnapshot'</a>,
--   <a>dbClusterSnapshot_kmsKeyId</a> - If <tt>StorageEncrypted</tt> is
--   <tt>true</tt>, the KMS key identifier for the encrypted cluster
--   snapshot.
--   
--   <a>$sel:snapshotCreateTime:DBClusterSnapshot'</a>,
--   <a>dbClusterSnapshot_snapshotCreateTime</a> - Provides the time when
--   the snapshot was taken, in UTC.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceDBClusterSnapshotArn:DBClusterSnapshot'</a>,
--   <a>dbClusterSnapshot_sourceDBClusterSnapshotArn</a> - If the cluster
--   snapshot was copied from a source cluster snapshot, the ARN for the
--   source cluster snapshot; otherwise, a null value.
--   
--   <a>$sel:clusterCreateTime:DBClusterSnapshot'</a>,
--   <a>dbClusterSnapshot_clusterCreateTime</a> - Specifies the time when
--   the cluster was created, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).
--   
--   <a>$sel:percentProgress:DBClusterSnapshot'</a>,
--   <a>dbClusterSnapshot_percentProgress</a> - Specifies the percentage of
--   the estimated data that has been transferred.
--   
--   <a>$sel:port:DBClusterSnapshot'</a>, <a>dbClusterSnapshot_port</a> -
--   Specifies the port that the cluster was listening on at the time of
--   the snapshot.
newDBClusterSnapshot :: DBClusterSnapshot

-- | Provides the version of the database engine for this cluster snapshot.
dbClusterSnapshot_engineVersion :: Lens' DBClusterSnapshot (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies the status of this cluster snapshot.
dbClusterSnapshot_status :: Lens' DBClusterSnapshot (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies whether the cluster snapshot is encrypted.
dbClusterSnapshot_storageEncrypted :: Lens' DBClusterSnapshot (Maybe Bool)

-- | Specifies the cluster identifier of the cluster that this cluster
--   snapshot was created from.
dbClusterSnapshot_dbClusterIdentifier :: Lens' DBClusterSnapshot (Maybe Text)

-- | Provides the master user name for the cluster snapshot.
dbClusterSnapshot_masterUsername :: Lens' DBClusterSnapshot (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the cluster snapshot.
dbClusterSnapshot_dbClusterSnapshotArn :: Lens' DBClusterSnapshot (Maybe Text)

-- | Provides the virtual private cloud (VPC) ID that is associated with
--   the cluster snapshot.
dbClusterSnapshot_vpcId :: Lens' DBClusterSnapshot (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies the identifier for the cluster snapshot.
dbClusterSnapshot_dbClusterSnapshotIdentifier :: Lens' DBClusterSnapshot (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies the name of the database engine.
dbClusterSnapshot_engine :: Lens' DBClusterSnapshot (Maybe Text)

-- | Provides the list of Amazon EC2 Availability Zones that instances in
--   the cluster snapshot can be restored in.
dbClusterSnapshot_availabilityZones :: Lens' DBClusterSnapshot (Maybe [Text])

-- | Provides the type of the cluster snapshot.
dbClusterSnapshot_snapshotType :: Lens' DBClusterSnapshot (Maybe Text)

-- | If <tt>StorageEncrypted</tt> is <tt>true</tt>, the KMS key identifier
--   for the encrypted cluster snapshot.
dbClusterSnapshot_kmsKeyId :: Lens' DBClusterSnapshot (Maybe Text)

-- | Provides the time when the snapshot was taken, in UTC.
dbClusterSnapshot_snapshotCreateTime :: Lens' DBClusterSnapshot (Maybe UTCTime)

--   ARN for the source cluster snapshot; otherwise, a null value.

--   Coordinated Time (UTC).

--   transferred.

--   the snapshot.
dbClusterSnapshot_port :: Lens' DBClusterSnapshot (Maybe Int)

module Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.DBClusterSnapshotAttribute

-- | Contains the name and values of a manual cluster snapshot attribute.
--   
--   Manual cluster snapshot attributes are used to authorize other
--   accounts to restore a manual cluster snapshot.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDBClusterSnapshotAttribute</a> smart constructor.
data DBClusterSnapshotAttribute
DBClusterSnapshotAttribute' :: Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> DBClusterSnapshotAttribute

-- | The values for the manual cluster snapshot attribute.
--   
--   If the <tt>AttributeName</tt> field is set to <tt>restore</tt>, then
--   this element returns a list of IDs of the accounts that are authorized
--   to copy or restore the manual cluster snapshot. If a value of
--   <tt>all</tt> is in the list, then the manual cluster snapshot is
--   public and available for any account to copy or restore.
[$sel:attributeValues:DBClusterSnapshotAttribute'] :: DBClusterSnapshotAttribute -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The name of the manual cluster snapshot attribute.
--   
--   The attribute named <tt>restore</tt> refers to the list of accounts
--   that have permission to copy or restore the manual cluster snapshot.
[$sel:attributeName:DBClusterSnapshotAttribute'] :: DBClusterSnapshotAttribute -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>DBClusterSnapshotAttribute</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:attributeValues:DBClusterSnapshotAttribute'</a>,
--   <a>dbClusterSnapshotAttribute_attributeValues</a> - The values for the
--   manual cluster snapshot attribute.
--   
--   If the <tt>AttributeName</tt> field is set to <tt>restore</tt>, then
--   this element returns a list of IDs of the accounts that are authorized
--   to copy or restore the manual cluster snapshot. If a value of
--   <tt>all</tt> is in the list, then the manual cluster snapshot is
--   public and available for any account to copy or restore.
--   
--   <a>$sel:attributeName:DBClusterSnapshotAttribute'</a>,
--   <a>dbClusterSnapshotAttribute_attributeName</a> - The name of the
--   manual cluster snapshot attribute.
--   
--   The attribute named <tt>restore</tt> refers to the list of accounts
--   that have permission to copy or restore the manual cluster snapshot.
newDBClusterSnapshotAttribute :: DBClusterSnapshotAttribute

-- | The values for the manual cluster snapshot attribute.
--   
--   If the <tt>AttributeName</tt> field is set to <tt>restore</tt>, then
--   this element returns a list of IDs of the accounts that are authorized
--   to copy or restore the manual cluster snapshot. If a value of
--   <tt>all</tt> is in the list, then the manual cluster snapshot is
--   public and available for any account to copy or restore.
dbClusterSnapshotAttribute_attributeValues :: Lens' DBClusterSnapshotAttribute (Maybe [Text])

-- | The name of the manual cluster snapshot attribute.
--   
--   The attribute named <tt>restore</tt> refers to the list of accounts
--   that have permission to copy or restore the manual cluster snapshot.
dbClusterSnapshotAttribute_attributeName :: Lens' DBClusterSnapshotAttribute (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.DBClusterSnapshotAttribute.DBClusterSnapshotAttribute
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.DBClusterSnapshotAttribute.DBClusterSnapshotAttribute
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.DBClusterSnapshotAttribute.DBClusterSnapshotAttribute
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.DBClusterSnapshotAttribute.DBClusterSnapshotAttribute
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.DBClusterSnapshotAttribute.DBClusterSnapshotAttribute
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.DBClusterSnapshotAttribute.DBClusterSnapshotAttribute
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.DBClusterSnapshotAttribute.DBClusterSnapshotAttribute

module Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.DBInstanceStatusInfo

-- | Provides a list of status information for an instance.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDBInstanceStatusInfo</a> smart constructor.
data DBInstanceStatusInfo
DBInstanceStatusInfo' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> DBInstanceStatusInfo

-- | Status of the instance. For a <tt>StatusType</tt> of read replica, the
--   values can be <tt>replicating</tt>, error, <tt>stopped</tt>, or
--   <tt>terminated</tt>.
[$sel:status:DBInstanceStatusInfo'] :: DBInstanceStatusInfo -> Maybe Text

-- | A Boolean value that is <tt>true</tt> if the instance is operating
--   normally, or <tt>false</tt> if the instance is in an error state.
[$sel:normal:DBInstanceStatusInfo'] :: DBInstanceStatusInfo -> Maybe Bool

-- | This value is currently "<tt>read replication</tt>."
[$sel:statusType:DBInstanceStatusInfo'] :: DBInstanceStatusInfo -> Maybe Text

-- | Details of the error if there is an error for the instance. If the
--   instance is not in an error state, this value is blank.
[$sel:message:DBInstanceStatusInfo'] :: DBInstanceStatusInfo -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>DBInstanceStatusInfo</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:DBInstanceStatusInfo'</a>,
--   <a>dbInstanceStatusInfo_status</a> - Status of the instance. For a
--   <tt>StatusType</tt> of read replica, the values can be
--   <tt>replicating</tt>, error, <tt>stopped</tt>, or <tt>terminated</tt>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:normal:DBInstanceStatusInfo'</a>,
--   <a>dbInstanceStatusInfo_normal</a> - A Boolean value that is
--   <tt>true</tt> if the instance is operating normally, or <tt>false</tt>
--   if the instance is in an error state.
--   
--   <a>$sel:statusType:DBInstanceStatusInfo'</a>,
--   <a>dbInstanceStatusInfo_statusType</a> - This value is currently
--   "<tt>read replication</tt>."
--   
--   <a>$sel:message:DBInstanceStatusInfo'</a>,
--   <a>dbInstanceStatusInfo_message</a> - Details of the error if there is
--   an error for the instance. If the instance is not in an error state,
--   this value is blank.
newDBInstanceStatusInfo :: DBInstanceStatusInfo

-- | Status of the instance. For a <tt>StatusType</tt> of read replica, the
--   values can be <tt>replicating</tt>, error, <tt>stopped</tt>, or
--   <tt>terminated</tt>.
dbInstanceStatusInfo_status :: Lens' DBInstanceStatusInfo (Maybe Text)

-- | A Boolean value that is <tt>true</tt> if the instance is operating
--   normally, or <tt>false</tt> if the instance is in an error state.
dbInstanceStatusInfo_normal :: Lens' DBInstanceStatusInfo (Maybe Bool)

-- | This value is currently "<tt>read replication</tt>."
dbInstanceStatusInfo_statusType :: Lens' DBInstanceStatusInfo (Maybe Text)

-- | Details of the error if there is an error for the instance. If the
--   instance is not in an error state, this value is blank.
dbInstanceStatusInfo_message :: Lens' DBInstanceStatusInfo (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.DBInstanceStatusInfo.DBInstanceStatusInfo
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.DBInstanceStatusInfo.DBInstanceStatusInfo
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.DBInstanceStatusInfo.DBInstanceStatusInfo
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.DBInstanceStatusInfo.DBInstanceStatusInfo

module Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Endpoint

-- | Network information for accessing a cluster or instance. Client
--   programs must specify a valid endpoint to access these Amazon
--   DocumentDB resources.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newEndpoint</a> smart constructor.
data Endpoint
Endpoint' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Int -> Endpoint

-- | Specifies the ID that Amazon Route 53 assigns when you create a hosted
--   zone.
[$sel:hostedZoneId:Endpoint'] :: Endpoint -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies the DNS address of the instance.
[$sel:address:Endpoint'] :: Endpoint -> Maybe Text

[$sel:port:Endpoint'] :: Endpoint -> Maybe Int

--   fields.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   Specifies the ID that Amazon Route 53 assigns when you create a hosted
--   zone.
--   
--   <a>$sel:address:Endpoint'</a>, <a>endpoint_address</a> - Specifies the
--   DNS address of the instance.
--   
--   <a>$sel:port:Endpoint'</a>, <a>endpoint_port</a> - Specifies the port
--   that the database engine is listening on.
newEndpoint :: Endpoint

--   zone.

module Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.EventSubscription

-- | Detailed information about an event to which you have subscribed.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newEventSubscription</a> smart constructor.
data EventSubscription
EventSubscription' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe [Text] -> EventSubscription

-- | The status of the Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription.
--   
--   Constraints:
--   
--   Can be one of the following: <tt>creating</tt>, <tt>modifying</tt>,
--   <tt>deleting</tt>, <tt>active</tt>, <tt>no-permission</tt>,
--   <tt>topic-not-exist</tt>
--   
--   The <tt>no-permission</tt> status indicates that Amazon DocumentDB no
--   longer has permission to post to the SNS topic. The
--   <tt>topic-not-exist</tt> status indicates that the topic was deleted
--   after the subscription was created.
[$sel:status:EventSubscription'] :: EventSubscription -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Web Services customer account that is associated with the
--   Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription.
[$sel:customerAwsId:EventSubscription'] :: EventSubscription -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription ID.
[$sel:custSubscriptionId:EventSubscription'] :: EventSubscription -> Maybe Text

-- | The topic ARN of the Amazon DocumentDB event notification
--   subscription.
[$sel:snsTopicArn:EventSubscription'] :: EventSubscription -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the event subscription.
[$sel:eventSubscriptionArn:EventSubscription'] :: EventSubscription -> Maybe Text

-- | A Boolean value indicating whether the subscription is enabled. A
--   value of <tt>true</tt> indicates that the subscription is enabled.
[$sel:enabled:EventSubscription'] :: EventSubscription -> Maybe Bool

-- | The source type for the Amazon DocumentDB event notification
--   subscription.
[$sel:sourceType:EventSubscription'] :: EventSubscription -> Maybe Text

-- | The time at which the Amazon DocumentDB event notification
--   subscription was created.
[$sel:subscriptionCreationTime:EventSubscription'] :: EventSubscription -> Maybe Text

-- | A list of event categories for the Amazon DocumentDB event
--   notification subscription.
[$sel:eventCategoriesList:EventSubscription'] :: EventSubscription -> Maybe [Text]

-- | A list of source IDs for the Amazon DocumentDB event notification
--   subscription.
[$sel:sourceIdsList:EventSubscription'] :: EventSubscription -> Maybe [Text]

-- | Create a value of <a>EventSubscription</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:EventSubscription'</a>, <a>eventSubscription_status</a>
--   - The status of the Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription.
--   
--   Constraints:
--   
--   Can be one of the following: <tt>creating</tt>, <tt>modifying</tt>,
--   <tt>deleting</tt>, <tt>active</tt>, <tt>no-permission</tt>,
--   <tt>topic-not-exist</tt>
--   
--   The <tt>no-permission</tt> status indicates that Amazon DocumentDB no
--   longer has permission to post to the SNS topic. The
--   <tt>topic-not-exist</tt> status indicates that the topic was deleted
--   after the subscription was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:customerAwsId:EventSubscription'</a>,
--   <a>eventSubscription_customerAwsId</a> - The Amazon Web Services
--   customer account that is associated with the Amazon DocumentDB event
--   notification subscription.
--   
--   <a>$sel:custSubscriptionId:EventSubscription'</a>,
--   <a>eventSubscription_custSubscriptionId</a> - The Amazon DocumentDB
--   event notification subscription ID.
--   
--   <a>$sel:snsTopicArn:EventSubscription'</a>,
--   <a>eventSubscription_snsTopicArn</a> - The topic ARN of the Amazon
--   DocumentDB event notification subscription.
--   
--   <a>$sel:eventSubscriptionArn:EventSubscription'</a>,
--   <a>eventSubscription_eventSubscriptionArn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) for the event subscription.
--   
--   <a>$sel:enabled:EventSubscription'</a>,
--   <a>eventSubscription_enabled</a> - A Boolean value indicating whether
--   the subscription is enabled. A value of <tt>true</tt> indicates that
--   the subscription is enabled.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceType:EventSubscription'</a>,
--   <a>eventSubscription_sourceType</a> - The source type for the Amazon
--   DocumentDB event notification subscription.
--   
--   <a>$sel:subscriptionCreationTime:EventSubscription'</a>,
--   <a>eventSubscription_subscriptionCreationTime</a> - The time at which
--   the Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:eventCategoriesList:EventSubscription'</a>,
--   <a>eventSubscription_eventCategoriesList</a> - A list of event
--   categories for the Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceIdsList:EventSubscription'</a>,
--   <a>eventSubscription_sourceIdsList</a> - A list of source IDs for the
--   Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription.
newEventSubscription :: EventSubscription

-- | The status of the Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription.
--   
--   Constraints:
--   
--   Can be one of the following: <tt>creating</tt>, <tt>modifying</tt>,
--   <tt>deleting</tt>, <tt>active</tt>, <tt>no-permission</tt>,
--   <tt>topic-not-exist</tt>
--   
--   The <tt>no-permission</tt> status indicates that Amazon DocumentDB no
--   longer has permission to post to the SNS topic. The
--   <tt>topic-not-exist</tt> status indicates that the topic was deleted
--   after the subscription was created.
eventSubscription_status :: Lens' EventSubscription (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon Web Services customer account that is associated with the
--   Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription.
eventSubscription_customerAwsId :: Lens' EventSubscription (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription ID.
eventSubscription_custSubscriptionId :: Lens' EventSubscription (Maybe Text)

-- | The topic ARN of the Amazon DocumentDB event notification
--   subscription.
eventSubscription_snsTopicArn :: Lens' EventSubscription (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the event subscription.
eventSubscription_eventSubscriptionArn :: Lens' EventSubscription (Maybe Text)

-- | A Boolean value indicating whether the subscription is enabled. A
--   value of <tt>true</tt> indicates that the subscription is enabled.
eventSubscription_enabled :: Lens' EventSubscription (Maybe Bool)

-- | The source type for the Amazon DocumentDB event notification
--   subscription.
eventSubscription_sourceType :: Lens' EventSubscription (Maybe Text)

-- | The time at which the Amazon DocumentDB event notification
--   subscription was created.
eventSubscription_subscriptionCreationTime :: Lens' EventSubscription (Maybe Text)

-- | A list of event categories for the Amazon DocumentDB event
--   notification subscription.
eventSubscription_eventCategoriesList :: Lens' EventSubscription (Maybe [Text])

-- | A list of source IDs for the Amazon DocumentDB event notification
--   subscription.
eventSubscription_sourceIdsList :: Lens' EventSubscription (Maybe [Text])
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.EventSubscription.EventSubscription
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.EventSubscription.EventSubscription
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.EventSubscription.EventSubscription
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.EventSubscription.EventSubscription
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.EventSubscription.EventSubscription
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.EventSubscription.EventSubscription
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.EventSubscription.EventSubscription


module Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Filter

-- | A named set of filter values, used to return a more specific list of
--   results. You can use a filter to match a set of resources by specific
--   criteria, such as IDs.
--   
--   Wildcards are not supported in filters.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFilter</a> smart constructor.
data Filter
Filter' :: Text -> [Text] -> Filter

-- | The name of the filter. Filter names are case sensitive.
[$sel:name:Filter'] :: Filter -> Text

-- | One or more filter values. Filter values are case sensitive.
[$sel:values:Filter'] :: Filter -> [Text]

-- | Create a value of <a>Filter</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:Filter'</a>, <a>filter_name</a> - The name of the filter.
--   Filter names are case sensitive.
--   
--   <a>$sel:values:Filter'</a>, <a>filter_values</a> - One or more filter
--   values. Filter values are case sensitive.
newFilter :: Text -> Filter

-- | The name of the filter. Filter names are case sensitive.
filter_name :: Lens' Filter Text

-- | One or more filter values. Filter values are case sensitive.
filter_values :: Lens' Filter [Text]
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Filter.Filter
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Filter.Filter
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Filter.Filter
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Filter.Filter
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Filter.Filter
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Filter.Filter
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Filter.Filter


module Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.GlobalClusterMember

-- | A data structure with information about any primary and secondary
--   clusters associated with an Amazon DocumentDB global clusters.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newGlobalClusterMember</a> smart constructor.
data GlobalClusterMember
GlobalClusterMember' :: Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> GlobalClusterMember

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for each read-only secondary cluster
--   associated with the Aurora global cluster.
[$sel:readers:GlobalClusterMember'] :: GlobalClusterMember -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for each Amazon DocumentDB cluster.
[$sel:dbClusterArn:GlobalClusterMember'] :: GlobalClusterMember -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies whether the Amazon DocumentDB cluster is the primary cluster
--   (that is, has read-write capability) for the Amazon DocumentDB global
--   cluster with which it is associated.
[$sel:isWriter:GlobalClusterMember'] :: GlobalClusterMember -> Maybe Bool

-- | Create a value of <a>GlobalClusterMember</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:readers:GlobalClusterMember'</a>,
--   <a>globalClusterMember_readers</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
--   for each read-only secondary cluster associated with the Aurora global
--   cluster.
--   
--   <a>$sel:dbClusterArn:GlobalClusterMember'</a>,
--   <a>globalClusterMember_dbClusterArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name
--   (ARN) for each Amazon DocumentDB cluster.
--   
--   <a>$sel:isWriter:GlobalClusterMember'</a>,
--   <a>globalClusterMember_isWriter</a> - Specifies whether the Amazon
--   DocumentDB cluster is the primary cluster (that is, has read-write
--   capability) for the Amazon DocumentDB global cluster with which it is
--   associated.
newGlobalClusterMember :: GlobalClusterMember

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for each read-only secondary cluster
--   associated with the Aurora global cluster.
globalClusterMember_readers :: Lens' GlobalClusterMember (Maybe [Text])

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for each Amazon DocumentDB cluster.
globalClusterMember_dbClusterArn :: Lens' GlobalClusterMember (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies whether the Amazon DocumentDB cluster is the primary cluster
--   (that is, has read-write capability) for the Amazon DocumentDB global
--   cluster with which it is associated.
globalClusterMember_isWriter :: Lens' GlobalClusterMember (Maybe Bool)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.GlobalClusterMember.GlobalClusterMember
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.GlobalClusterMember.GlobalClusterMember
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.GlobalClusterMember.GlobalClusterMember
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.GlobalClusterMember.GlobalClusterMember
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.GlobalClusterMember.GlobalClusterMember
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.GlobalClusterMember.GlobalClusterMember
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.GlobalClusterMember.GlobalClusterMember


module Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.GlobalCluster

-- | A data type representing an Amazon DocumentDB global cluster.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newGlobalCluster</a> smart constructor.
data GlobalCluster
GlobalCluster' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [GlobalClusterMember] -> Maybe Text -> GlobalCluster

-- | Indicates the database engine version.
[$sel:engineVersion:GlobalCluster'] :: GlobalCluster -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies the current state of this global cluster.
[$sel:status:GlobalCluster'] :: GlobalCluster -> Maybe Text

-- | The deletion protection setting for the new global cluster.
[$sel:deletionProtection:GlobalCluster'] :: GlobalCluster -> Maybe Bool

-- | The storage encryption setting for the global cluster.
[$sel:storageEncrypted:GlobalCluster'] :: GlobalCluster -> Maybe Bool

-- | Contains a user-supplied global cluster identifier. This identifier is
--   the unique key that identifies a global cluster.
[$sel:globalClusterIdentifier:GlobalCluster'] :: GlobalCluster -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon DocumentDB database engine used by the global cluster.
[$sel:engine:GlobalCluster'] :: GlobalCluster -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the global cluster.
[$sel:globalClusterArn:GlobalCluster'] :: GlobalCluster -> Maybe Text

-- | The default database name within the new global cluster.
[$sel:databaseName:GlobalCluster'] :: GlobalCluster -> Maybe Text

-- | The list of cluster IDs for secondary clusters within the global
--   cluster. Currently limited to one item.
[$sel:globalClusterMembers:GlobalCluster'] :: GlobalCluster -> Maybe [GlobalClusterMember]

-- | The Region-unique, immutable identifier for the global database
--   cluster. This identifier is found in AWS CloudTrail log entries
--   whenever the AWS KMS customer master key (CMK) for the cluster is
--   accessed.
[$sel:globalClusterResourceId:GlobalCluster'] :: GlobalCluster -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>GlobalCluster</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:engineVersion:GlobalCluster'</a>,
--   <a>globalCluster_engineVersion</a> - Indicates the database engine
--   version.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:GlobalCluster'</a>, <a>globalCluster_status</a> -
--   Specifies the current state of this global cluster.
--   
--   <a>$sel:deletionProtection:GlobalCluster'</a>,
--   <a>globalCluster_deletionProtection</a> - The deletion protection
--   setting for the new global cluster.
--   
--   <a>$sel:storageEncrypted:GlobalCluster'</a>,
--   <a>globalCluster_storageEncrypted</a> - The storage encryption setting
--   for the global cluster.
--   
--   <a>$sel:globalClusterIdentifier:GlobalCluster'</a>,
--   <a>globalCluster_globalClusterIdentifier</a> - Contains a
--   user-supplied global cluster identifier. This identifier is the unique
--   key that identifies a global cluster.
--   
--   <a>$sel:engine:GlobalCluster'</a>, <a>globalCluster_engine</a> - The
--   Amazon DocumentDB database engine used by the global cluster.
--   
--   <a>$sel:globalClusterArn:GlobalCluster'</a>,
--   <a>globalCluster_globalClusterArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
--   for the global cluster.
--   
--   <a>$sel:databaseName:GlobalCluster'</a>,
--   <a>globalCluster_databaseName</a> - The default database name within
--   the new global cluster.
--   
--   <a>$sel:globalClusterMembers:GlobalCluster'</a>,
--   <a>globalCluster_globalClusterMembers</a> - The list of cluster IDs
--   for secondary clusters within the global cluster. Currently limited to
--   one item.
--   
--   <a>$sel:globalClusterResourceId:GlobalCluster'</a>,
--   <a>globalCluster_globalClusterResourceId</a> - The Region-unique,
--   immutable identifier for the global database cluster. This identifier
--   is found in AWS CloudTrail log entries whenever the AWS KMS customer
--   master key (CMK) for the cluster is accessed.
newGlobalCluster :: GlobalCluster

-- | Indicates the database engine version.
globalCluster_engineVersion :: Lens' GlobalCluster (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies the current state of this global cluster.
globalCluster_status :: Lens' GlobalCluster (Maybe Text)

-- | The deletion protection setting for the new global cluster.
globalCluster_deletionProtection :: Lens' GlobalCluster (Maybe Bool)

-- | The storage encryption setting for the global cluster.
globalCluster_storageEncrypted :: Lens' GlobalCluster (Maybe Bool)

-- | Contains a user-supplied global cluster identifier. This identifier is
--   the unique key that identifies a global cluster.
globalCluster_globalClusterIdentifier :: Lens' GlobalCluster (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon DocumentDB database engine used by the global cluster.
globalCluster_engine :: Lens' GlobalCluster (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the global cluster.
globalCluster_globalClusterArn :: Lens' GlobalCluster (Maybe Text)

-- | The default database name within the new global cluster.
globalCluster_databaseName :: Lens' GlobalCluster (Maybe Text)

-- | The list of cluster IDs for secondary clusters within the global
--   cluster. Currently limited to one item.
globalCluster_globalClusterMembers :: Lens' GlobalCluster (Maybe [GlobalClusterMember])

-- | The Region-unique, immutable identifier for the global database
--   cluster. This identifier is found in AWS CloudTrail log entries
--   whenever the AWS KMS customer master key (CMK) for the cluster is
--   accessed.
globalCluster_globalClusterResourceId :: Lens' GlobalCluster (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.GlobalCluster.GlobalCluster
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.GlobalCluster.GlobalCluster
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.GlobalCluster.GlobalCluster
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.GlobalCluster.GlobalCluster
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.GlobalCluster.GlobalCluster
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.GlobalCluster.GlobalCluster
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.GlobalCluster.GlobalCluster

module Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Parameter

-- | Detailed information about an individual parameter.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newParameter</a> smart constructor.
data Parameter
Parameter' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ApplyMethod -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Parameter

-- | Specifies the engine-specific parameters type.
[$sel:applyType:Parameter'] :: Parameter -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies the value of the parameter.
[$sel:parameterValue:Parameter'] :: Parameter -> Maybe Text

-- | Indicates when to apply parameter updates.
[$sel:applyMethod:Parameter'] :: Parameter -> Maybe ApplyMethod

-- | The earliest engine version to which the parameter can apply.
[$sel:minimumEngineVersion:Parameter'] :: Parameter -> Maybe Text

-- | Indicates the source of the parameter value.
[$sel:source:Parameter'] :: Parameter -> Maybe Text

-- | Indicates whether (<tt>true</tt>) or not (<tt>false</tt>) the
--   parameter can be modified. Some parameters have security or
--   operational implications that prevent them from being changed.
[$sel:isModifiable:Parameter'] :: Parameter -> Maybe Bool

-- | Specifies the valid data type for the parameter.
[$sel:dataType:Parameter'] :: Parameter -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies the valid range of values for the parameter.
[$sel:allowedValues:Parameter'] :: Parameter -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies the name of the parameter.
[$sel:parameterName:Parameter'] :: Parameter -> Maybe Text

-- | Provides a description of the parameter.
[$sel:description:Parameter'] :: Parameter -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Parameter</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:applyType:Parameter'</a>, <a>parameter_applyType</a> -
--   Specifies the engine-specific parameters type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:parameterValue:Parameter'</a>, <a>parameter_parameterValue</a>
--   - Specifies the value of the parameter.
--   
--   <a>$sel:applyMethod:Parameter'</a>, <a>parameter_applyMethod</a> -
--   Indicates when to apply parameter updates.
--   
--   <a>$sel:minimumEngineVersion:Parameter'</a>,
--   <a>parameter_minimumEngineVersion</a> - The earliest engine version to
--   which the parameter can apply.
--   
--   <a>$sel:source:Parameter'</a>, <a>parameter_source</a> - Indicates the
--   source of the parameter value.
--   
--   <a>$sel:isModifiable:Parameter'</a>, <a>parameter_isModifiable</a> -
--   Indicates whether (<tt>true</tt>) or not (<tt>false</tt>) the
--   parameter can be modified. Some parameters have security or
--   operational implications that prevent them from being changed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:dataType:Parameter'</a>, <a>parameter_dataType</a> - Specifies
--   the valid data type for the parameter.
--   
--   <a>$sel:allowedValues:Parameter'</a>, <a>parameter_allowedValues</a> -
--   Specifies the valid range of values for the parameter.
--   
--   <a>$sel:parameterName:Parameter'</a>, <a>parameter_parameterName</a> -
--   Specifies the name of the parameter.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:Parameter'</a>, <a>parameter_description</a> -
--   Provides a description of the parameter.
newParameter :: Parameter

-- | Specifies the engine-specific parameters type.
parameter_applyType :: Lens' Parameter (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies the value of the parameter.
parameter_parameterValue :: Lens' Parameter (Maybe Text)

-- | Indicates when to apply parameter updates.
parameter_applyMethod :: Lens' Parameter (Maybe ApplyMethod)

-- | The earliest engine version to which the parameter can apply.
parameter_minimumEngineVersion :: Lens' Parameter (Maybe Text)

-- | Indicates the source of the parameter value.
parameter_source :: Lens' Parameter (Maybe Text)

-- | Indicates whether (<tt>true</tt>) or not (<tt>false</tt>) the
--   parameter can be modified. Some parameters have security or
--   operational implications that prevent them from being changed.
parameter_isModifiable :: Lens' Parameter (Maybe Bool)

-- | Specifies the valid data type for the parameter.
parameter_dataType :: Lens' Parameter (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies the valid range of values for the parameter.
parameter_allowedValues :: Lens' Parameter (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies the name of the parameter.
parameter_parameterName :: Lens' Parameter (Maybe Text)

-- | Provides a description of the parameter.
parameter_description :: Lens' Parameter (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Parameter.Parameter
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Parameter.Parameter
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Parameter.Parameter
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Parameter.Parameter
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Parameter.Parameter
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Parameter.Parameter
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Parameter.Parameter
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Parameter.Parameter


module Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.EngineDefaults

-- | Contains the result of a successful invocation of the
--   <tt>DescribeEngineDefaultClusterParameters</tt> operation.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newEngineDefaults</a> smart constructor.
data EngineDefaults
EngineDefaults' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [Parameter] -> EngineDefaults

-- | The name of the cluster parameter group family to return the engine
--   parameter information for.
[$sel:dbParameterGroupFamily:EngineDefaults'] :: EngineDefaults -> Maybe Text

-- | An optional pagination token provided by a previous request. If this
--   parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the
--   marker, up to the value specified by <tt>MaxRecords</tt>.
[$sel:marker:EngineDefaults'] :: EngineDefaults -> Maybe Text

-- | The parameters of a particular cluster parameter group family.
[$sel:parameters:EngineDefaults'] :: EngineDefaults -> Maybe [Parameter]

-- | Create a value of <a>EngineDefaults</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:dbParameterGroupFamily:EngineDefaults'</a>,
--   <a>engineDefaults_dbParameterGroupFamily</a> - The name of the cluster
--   parameter group family to return the engine parameter information for.
--   
--   <a>$sel:marker:EngineDefaults'</a>, <a>engineDefaults_marker</a> - An
--   optional pagination token provided by a previous request. If this
--   parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the
--   marker, up to the value specified by <tt>MaxRecords</tt>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:parameters:EngineDefaults'</a>,
--   <a>engineDefaults_parameters</a> - The parameters of a particular
--   cluster parameter group family.
newEngineDefaults :: EngineDefaults

-- | The name of the cluster parameter group family to return the engine
--   parameter information for.
engineDefaults_dbParameterGroupFamily :: Lens' EngineDefaults (Maybe Text)

-- | An optional pagination token provided by a previous request. If this
--   parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the
--   marker, up to the value specified by <tt>MaxRecords</tt>.
engineDefaults_marker :: Lens' EngineDefaults (Maybe Text)

-- | The parameters of a particular cluster parameter group family.
engineDefaults_parameters :: Lens' EngineDefaults (Maybe [Parameter])
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.EngineDefaults.EngineDefaults
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.EngineDefaults.EngineDefaults
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.EngineDefaults.EngineDefaults
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.EngineDefaults.EngineDefaults
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.EngineDefaults.EngineDefaults
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.EngineDefaults.EngineDefaults
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.EngineDefaults.EngineDefaults


module Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.PendingCloudwatchLogsExports

-- | A list of the log types whose configuration is still pending. These
--   log types are in the process of being activated or deactivated.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newPendingCloudwatchLogsExports</a> smart constructor.
data PendingCloudwatchLogsExports
PendingCloudwatchLogsExports' :: Maybe [Text] -> Maybe [Text] -> PendingCloudwatchLogsExports

-- | Log types that are in the process of being deactivated. After they are
--   deactivated, these log types aren't exported to CloudWatch Logs.
[$sel:logTypesToEnable:PendingCloudwatchLogsExports'] :: PendingCloudwatchLogsExports -> Maybe [Text]

-- | Log types that are in the process of being enabled. After they are
--   enabled, these log types are exported to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.
[$sel:logTypesToDisable:PendingCloudwatchLogsExports'] :: PendingCloudwatchLogsExports -> Maybe [Text]

-- | Create a value of <a>PendingCloudwatchLogsExports</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:logTypesToEnable:PendingCloudwatchLogsExports'</a>,
--   <a>pendingCloudwatchLogsExports_logTypesToEnable</a> - Log types that
--   are in the process of being deactivated. After they are deactivated,
--   these log types aren't exported to CloudWatch Logs.
--   
--   <a>$sel:logTypesToDisable:PendingCloudwatchLogsExports'</a>,
--   <a>pendingCloudwatchLogsExports_logTypesToDisable</a> - Log types that
--   are in the process of being enabled. After they are enabled, these log
--   types are exported to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.
newPendingCloudwatchLogsExports :: PendingCloudwatchLogsExports

-- | Log types that are in the process of being deactivated. After they are
--   deactivated, these log types aren't exported to CloudWatch Logs.
pendingCloudwatchLogsExports_logTypesToEnable :: Lens' PendingCloudwatchLogsExports (Maybe [Text])

-- | Log types that are in the process of being enabled. After they are
--   enabled, these log types are exported to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.
pendingCloudwatchLogsExports_logTypesToDisable :: Lens' PendingCloudwatchLogsExports (Maybe [Text])
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.PendingCloudwatchLogsExports.PendingCloudwatchLogsExports
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.PendingCloudwatchLogsExports.PendingCloudwatchLogsExports
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.PendingCloudwatchLogsExports.PendingCloudwatchLogsExports
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.PendingCloudwatchLogsExports.PendingCloudwatchLogsExports
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.PendingCloudwatchLogsExports.PendingCloudwatchLogsExports
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.PendingCloudwatchLogsExports.PendingCloudwatchLogsExports
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.PendingCloudwatchLogsExports.PendingCloudwatchLogsExports


module Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.PendingMaintenanceAction

-- | Provides information about a pending maintenance action for a
--   resource.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newPendingMaintenanceAction</a> smart constructor.
data PendingMaintenanceAction
PendingMaintenanceAction' :: Maybe ISO8601 -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ISO8601 -> Maybe ISO8601 -> PendingMaintenanceAction

-- | The date of the maintenance window when the action is applied. The
--   maintenance action is applied to the resource during its first
--   maintenance window after this date. If this date is specified, any
--   <tt>next-maintenance</tt> opt-in requests are ignored.
[$sel:autoAppliedAfterDate:PendingMaintenanceAction'] :: PendingMaintenanceAction -> Maybe ISO8601

-- | The type of pending maintenance action that is available for the
--   resource.
[$sel:action:PendingMaintenanceAction'] :: PendingMaintenanceAction -> Maybe Text

-- | Indicates the type of opt-in request that has been received for the
--   resource.
[$sel:optInStatus:PendingMaintenanceAction'] :: PendingMaintenanceAction -> Maybe Text

-- | A description providing more detail about the maintenance action.
[$sel:description:PendingMaintenanceAction'] :: PendingMaintenanceAction -> Maybe Text

-- | The date when the maintenance action is automatically applied. The
--   maintenance action is applied to the resource on this date regardless
--   of the maintenance window for the resource. If this date is specified,
--   any <tt>immediate</tt> opt-in requests are ignored.
[$sel:forcedApplyDate:PendingMaintenanceAction'] :: PendingMaintenanceAction -> Maybe ISO8601

-- | The effective date when the pending maintenance action is applied to
--   the resource.
[$sel:currentApplyDate:PendingMaintenanceAction'] :: PendingMaintenanceAction -> Maybe ISO8601

-- | Create a value of <a>PendingMaintenanceAction</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:autoAppliedAfterDate:PendingMaintenanceAction'</a>,
--   <a>pendingMaintenanceAction_autoAppliedAfterDate</a> - The date of the
--   maintenance window when the action is applied. The maintenance action
--   is applied to the resource during its first maintenance window after
--   this date. If this date is specified, any <tt>next-maintenance</tt>
--   opt-in requests are ignored.
--   
--   <a>$sel:action:PendingMaintenanceAction'</a>,
--   <a>pendingMaintenanceAction_action</a> - The type of pending
--   maintenance action that is available for the resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:optInStatus:PendingMaintenanceAction'</a>,
--   <a>pendingMaintenanceAction_optInStatus</a> - Indicates the type of
--   opt-in request that has been received for the resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:PendingMaintenanceAction'</a>,
--   <a>pendingMaintenanceAction_description</a> - A description providing
--   more detail about the maintenance action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:forcedApplyDate:PendingMaintenanceAction'</a>,
--   <a>pendingMaintenanceAction_forcedApplyDate</a> - The date when the
--   maintenance action is automatically applied. The maintenance action is
--   applied to the resource on this date regardless of the maintenance
--   window for the resource. If this date is specified, any
--   <tt>immediate</tt> opt-in requests are ignored.
--   
--   <a>$sel:currentApplyDate:PendingMaintenanceAction'</a>,
--   <a>pendingMaintenanceAction_currentApplyDate</a> - The effective date
--   when the pending maintenance action is applied to the resource.
newPendingMaintenanceAction :: PendingMaintenanceAction

-- | The date of the maintenance window when the action is applied. The
--   maintenance action is applied to the resource during its first
--   maintenance window after this date. If this date is specified, any
--   <tt>next-maintenance</tt> opt-in requests are ignored.
pendingMaintenanceAction_autoAppliedAfterDate :: Lens' PendingMaintenanceAction (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The type of pending maintenance action that is available for the
--   resource.
pendingMaintenanceAction_action :: Lens' PendingMaintenanceAction (Maybe Text)

-- | Indicates the type of opt-in request that has been received for the
--   resource.
pendingMaintenanceAction_optInStatus :: Lens' PendingMaintenanceAction (Maybe Text)

-- | A description providing more detail about the maintenance action.
pendingMaintenanceAction_description :: Lens' PendingMaintenanceAction (Maybe Text)

-- | The date when the maintenance action is automatically applied. The
--   maintenance action is applied to the resource on this date regardless
--   of the maintenance window for the resource. If this date is specified,
--   any <tt>immediate</tt> opt-in requests are ignored.
pendingMaintenanceAction_forcedApplyDate :: Lens' PendingMaintenanceAction (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The effective date when the pending maintenance action is applied to
--   the resource.
pendingMaintenanceAction_currentApplyDate :: Lens' PendingMaintenanceAction (Maybe UTCTime)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.PendingMaintenanceAction.PendingMaintenanceAction
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.PendingMaintenanceAction.PendingMaintenanceAction
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.PendingMaintenanceAction.PendingMaintenanceAction
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.PendingMaintenanceAction.PendingMaintenanceAction
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.PendingMaintenanceAction.PendingMaintenanceAction
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.PendingMaintenanceAction.PendingMaintenanceAction
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.PendingMaintenanceAction.PendingMaintenanceAction


module Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.PendingModifiedValues

-- | One or more modified settings for an instance. These modified settings
--   have been requested, but haven't been applied yet.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newPendingModifiedValues</a> smart constructor.
data PendingModifiedValues
PendingModifiedValues' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe PendingCloudwatchLogsExports -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Text -> PendingModifiedValues

-- | Indicates the database engine version.
[$sel:engineVersion:PendingModifiedValues'] :: PendingModifiedValues -> Maybe Text

-- | Contains the pending or currently in-progress change of the master
--   credentials for the instance.
[$sel:masterUserPassword:PendingModifiedValues'] :: PendingModifiedValues -> Maybe Text

-- | The new subnet group for the instance.
[$sel:dbSubnetGroupName:PendingModifiedValues'] :: PendingModifiedValues -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies the new Provisioned IOPS value for the instance that will be
--   applied or is currently being applied.
[$sel:iops:PendingModifiedValues'] :: PendingModifiedValues -> Maybe Int

-- | Contains the new <tt>DBInstanceClass</tt> for the instance that will
--   be applied or is currently being applied.
[$sel:dbInstanceClass:PendingModifiedValues'] :: PendingModifiedValues -> Maybe Text

-- | The license model for the instance.
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>license-included</tt>,
--   <tt>bring-your-own-license</tt>, <tt>general-public-license</tt>
[$sel:licenseModel:PendingModifiedValues'] :: PendingModifiedValues -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies the identifier of the certificate authority (CA) certificate
--   for the DB instance.
[$sel:cACertificateIdentifier:PendingModifiedValues'] :: PendingModifiedValues -> Maybe Text

-- | Contains the new <tt>DBInstanceIdentifier</tt> for the instance that
--   will be applied or is currently being applied.
[$sel:dbInstanceIdentifier:PendingModifiedValues'] :: PendingModifiedValues -> Maybe Text

-- | A list of the log types whose configuration is still pending. These
--   log types are in the process of being activated or deactivated.
[$sel:pendingCloudwatchLogsExports:PendingModifiedValues'] :: PendingModifiedValues -> Maybe PendingCloudwatchLogsExports

-- | Specifies the pending number of days for which automated backups are
--   retained.
[$sel:backupRetentionPeriod:PendingModifiedValues'] :: PendingModifiedValues -> Maybe Int

-- | Indicates that the Single-AZ instance is to change to a Multi-AZ
--   deployment.
[$sel:multiAZ:PendingModifiedValues'] :: PendingModifiedValues -> Maybe Bool

-- | Contains the new <tt>AllocatedStorage</tt> size for then instance that
--   will be applied or is currently being applied.
[$sel:allocatedStorage:PendingModifiedValues'] :: PendingModifiedValues -> Maybe Int

-- | Specifies the pending port for the instance.
[$sel:port:PendingModifiedValues'] :: PendingModifiedValues -> Maybe Int

-- | Specifies the storage type to be associated with the instance.
[$sel:storageType:PendingModifiedValues'] :: PendingModifiedValues -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>PendingModifiedValues</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:engineVersion:PendingModifiedValues'</a>,
--   <a>pendingModifiedValues_engineVersion</a> - Indicates the database
--   engine version.
--   
--   <a>$sel:masterUserPassword:PendingModifiedValues'</a>,
--   <a>pendingModifiedValues_masterUserPassword</a> - Contains the pending
--   or currently in-progress change of the master credentials for the
--   instance.
--   
--   <a>$sel:dbSubnetGroupName:PendingModifiedValues'</a>,
--   <a>pendingModifiedValues_dbSubnetGroupName</a> - The new subnet group
--   for the instance.
--   
--   <a>$sel:iops:PendingModifiedValues'</a>,
--   <a>pendingModifiedValues_iops</a> - Specifies the new Provisioned IOPS
--   value for the instance that will be applied or is currently being
--   applied.
--   
--   <a>$sel:dbInstanceClass:PendingModifiedValues'</a>,
--   <a>pendingModifiedValues_dbInstanceClass</a> - Contains the new
--   <tt>DBInstanceClass</tt> for the instance that will be applied or is
--   currently being applied.
--   
--   <a>$sel:licenseModel:PendingModifiedValues'</a>,
--   <a>pendingModifiedValues_licenseModel</a> - The license model for the
--   instance.
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>license-included</tt>,
--   <tt>bring-your-own-license</tt>, <tt>general-public-license</tt>
--   
--   <a>$sel:cACertificateIdentifier:PendingModifiedValues'</a>,
--   <a>pendingModifiedValues_cACertificateIdentifier</a> - Specifies the
--   identifier of the certificate authority (CA) certificate for the DB
--   instance.
--   
--   <a>$sel:dbInstanceIdentifier:PendingModifiedValues'</a>,
--   <a>pendingModifiedValues_dbInstanceIdentifier</a> - Contains the new
--   <tt>DBInstanceIdentifier</tt> for the instance that will be applied or
--   is currently being applied.
--   
--   <a>$sel:pendingCloudwatchLogsExports:PendingModifiedValues'</a>,
--   <a>pendingModifiedValues_pendingCloudwatchLogsExports</a> - A list of
--   the log types whose configuration is still pending. These log types
--   are in the process of being activated or deactivated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:backupRetentionPeriod:PendingModifiedValues'</a>,
--   <a>pendingModifiedValues_backupRetentionPeriod</a> - Specifies the
--   pending number of days for which automated backups are retained.
--   
--   <a>$sel:multiAZ:PendingModifiedValues'</a>,
--   <a>pendingModifiedValues_multiAZ</a> - Indicates that the Single-AZ
--   instance is to change to a Multi-AZ deployment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:allocatedStorage:PendingModifiedValues'</a>,
--   <a>pendingModifiedValues_allocatedStorage</a> - Contains the new
--   <tt>AllocatedStorage</tt> size for then instance that will be applied
--   or is currently being applied.
--   
--   <a>$sel:port:PendingModifiedValues'</a>,
--   <a>pendingModifiedValues_port</a> - Specifies the pending port for the
--   instance.
--   
--   <a>$sel:storageType:PendingModifiedValues'</a>,
--   <a>pendingModifiedValues_storageType</a> - Specifies the storage type
--   to be associated with the instance.
newPendingModifiedValues :: PendingModifiedValues

-- | Indicates the database engine version.
pendingModifiedValues_engineVersion :: Lens' PendingModifiedValues (Maybe Text)

-- | Contains the pending or currently in-progress change of the master
--   credentials for the instance.
pendingModifiedValues_masterUserPassword :: Lens' PendingModifiedValues (Maybe Text)

-- | The new subnet group for the instance.
pendingModifiedValues_dbSubnetGroupName :: Lens' PendingModifiedValues (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies the new Provisioned IOPS value for the instance that will be
--   applied or is currently being applied.
pendingModifiedValues_iops :: Lens' PendingModifiedValues (Maybe Int)

-- | Contains the new <tt>DBInstanceClass</tt> for the instance that will
--   be applied or is currently being applied.
pendingModifiedValues_dbInstanceClass :: Lens' PendingModifiedValues (Maybe Text)

-- | The license model for the instance.
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>license-included</tt>,
--   <tt>bring-your-own-license</tt>, <tt>general-public-license</tt>

module Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Event

-- | Detailed information about an event.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newEvent</a> smart constructor.
data Event
Event' :: Maybe SourceType -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ISO8601 -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> Event

-- | Specifies the source type for this event.
[$sel:sourceType:Event'] :: Event -> Maybe SourceType

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the event.
[$sel:sourceArn:Event'] :: Event -> Maybe Text

-- | Provides the identifier for the source of the event.
[$sel:sourceIdentifier:Event'] :: Event -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies the date and time of the event.
[$sel:date:Event'] :: Event -> Maybe ISO8601

-- | Specifies the category for the event.
[$sel:eventCategories:Event'] :: Event -> Maybe [Text]

-- | Provides the text of this event.
[$sel:message:Event'] :: Event -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Event</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceType:Event'</a>, <a>event_sourceType</a> - Specifies the
--   source type for this event.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceArn:Event'</a>, <a>event_sourceArn</a> - The Amazon
--   Resource Name (ARN) for the event.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceIdentifier:Event'</a>, <a>event_sourceIdentifier</a> -
--   Provides the identifier for the source of the event.
--   
--   <a>$sel:date:Event'</a>, <a>event_date</a> - Specifies the date and
--   time of the event.
--   
--   <a>$sel:eventCategories:Event'</a>, <a>event_eventCategories</a> -
--   Specifies the category for the event.
--   
--   <a>$sel:message:Event'</a>, <a>event_message</a> - Provides the text
--   of this event.
newEvent :: Event

-- | Specifies the source type for this event.
event_sourceType :: Lens' Event (Maybe SourceType)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the event.
event_sourceArn :: Lens' Event (Maybe Text)

-- | Provides the identifier for the source of the event.
event_sourceIdentifier :: Lens' Event (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies the date and time of the event.
event_date :: Lens' Event (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | Specifies the category for the event.
event_eventCategories :: Lens' Event (Maybe [Text])

-- | Provides the text of this event.
event_message :: Lens' Event (Maybe Text)

instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.DocumentDB.Types.Event.Event
